item.title: Practifarma
item.description: Practifarma Responsible of design, development and deployment (DevOps) of web systems, under the agile frameworks, Test Driven Development, Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment. Achievements​: Co founder and partner of a new software company and develop a Web System for connecting pharmaceutical industry.
